com.sap.integration.utils.integrationdb.jpa

Class AbstractJpaLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.integration.utils.integrationdb.jpa.AbstractJpaLayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JpaLayer, JpaLayer

    public abstract class AbstractJpaLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for a persistence unit entities. Covers the connection initialization, simplifies access to the EntityManager, implements some helper methods etc. You may implement your own database connector and JPA layer.
